snippet: The State Department issued a travel advisory cautioning Americans planning to travel next month to Sochi, Russia, that terrorists have threatened to attack the Games.
abstract: State Department issues travel advisory cautioning Americans planning to attend the Winter Olympics in Sochi, Russia, that terrorists have threatened to attack the Games; advisory also expresses concern about quality of medical care in the region.
lead_paragraph: The State Department issued a travel advisory cautioning Americans planning to travel next month to Sochi, Russia, that terrorists have threatened to attack the Games.

headline.main: Americans Traveling to Winter Games Cautioned
headline.print_headline: Terrorism Among Dangers as U.S. Cautions Americans Traveling to Sochi
